meanings.definition: Bregmate: having sutures that meet at the bregma
meanings.sent1: The bregmate skull showed where the bones met at the top.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the bregmate area on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The bregmate puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her bregmate thoughts aligned seamlessly with her actions.
meanings.sent5: The bregmate connection between the two ideas was clear.

meanings.definition: Bregmate: relating to the junction of the sagittal and coronal sutures in the skull
meanings.sent1: The bregmate of the skull was where the sutures met.
meanings.sent2: He studied the bregmate closely during the anatomy class.
meanings.sent3: The bregmate was like the meeting point of two roads in the skull.
meanings.sent4: The bregmate was the bridge between the two major sutures.
meanings.sent5: The bregmate was the key point in understanding skull structure.
